name: WHITE CHERRY BLOSSOM WEDDING CENTREPIECE FLOWER ARRANGEMENT NEW COLOUR JUST IN
description:
New & exclusive from Forever Flowering                       

Realistic White Cherry Blossom Flower Arrangement☆★¸•*¸.•* 
Up for auction is one high-end floral centerpiece, conveniently
couriered to your door.
Displayed within a heavy glass vase,  the arrangement also offers the option of polished pebbles, the colour of your choice.  These stones along with the flowers have been permanently set in a superior quality artificial water within the vase. FF's original Floral Designs continue to surprise clients with REAL TOUCH petals that are botanically accurate in every detail.  The Forever Flowering artistic stylists are recognized for their modern, contemporary edge whilst maintaining a timeless class.

Measurements:     Length:90cm Width:30cm Height:30cm

Weddings, New Baby, Functions & Events, Home Decor, Corporate, Retail, Sympathies, Birthdays or Just Because I Love You! Surprise the person you love most in the world with a stylish Bouquet that will never die or welter... 
FILL YOUR LIFE WITH FLOWERS FOREVER!

name: Artificial Flowers Silk Tulips White Pink & Lilac Tulip Bouquet Vase & Water
description:
Exclusive from Forever Flowering ‘Nearly Natural’ Artificial Flowers

TRIO OF TULIPS Silk Flower Arrangement ☆★¸•*¸.•*

Bunch of Silk White Tulips

Bunch of Silk Pink Tulips

Bunch of Silk Lilac Tulips

Ultra Realistic Artificial Water

Trough Glass Vase

MEASUREMENTS       Length 20cm        Height 35cm       Width 10cm

FF's original Floral Designs continue to surprise clients with
lifelike petals that are botanically accurate in every detail.
Flower Arrangements and Table Centrepieces suitable for
every occasion. Custom made Flower Arrangements are also
affordably available. Forever Flowering's floral stylists are
recognized for their modern, contemporary edge whilst
maintaining a timeless class.

Our floral arrangements are quickly and conveniently couriered
to your door, wherever in the world you may be. 
Displayed elegantly within a heavy glass vase, the flower bouquet
comes with the option of coloured pebbles featured at the bottom
of the vase, set in the water. Free of charge. 
Both the stones and flowers come permanently set in a quality,
realistic artificial water. This unique product will look fresh
forever and will last even longer.                  

Fill your life with flowers and surprise the person you love most
with a flower bouquet that never dies or welters. Weddings,
new Baby, functions & Events, Home Decor, Corporate, Retail,
Sympathies, Birthdays or Just Because I Love You!

name: FLOWER ARRANGEMENT NEARLY NATURAL YELLOW DANCING ORCHID SPRAYS WILLOW TWIGS VASE
description:
'Nearly Natural' Flower Arrangement Yellow Dancing Orchids

with Array of Twigs & Willow


Introducing... 

This unique floral centerpiece will conveniently arrive to your door via Courier. 

Ready-to-display, straight out of the box.

Styled and presented in a quality glass vase, the Flowers are permanently set

in realistic Artificial Water. 

A completely new and affordable flower arrangement that lasts forever!

 

    Sprays of Yellow Dancing Orchids 

    Array of Twigs and Willows 

    Choice of White, Earth or Black Polished Stones

    Ultra Realistic Artificial Water

    Heavy Cylinder Glass Vase


Claim to Fame – Forever Flowering are creators of avant-garde permanent flower arrangements.

FF's modern floras continue to surprise clients with REAL-TOUCH petals that are botanically accurate in every detail.

Whilst establishing Forever Flowering's Hallmark of artistic floral designs.

Weddings, Home Decor, Corporate, Retail, Events, Sympathies, Mother’s Day, Birthdays or Because I Love You!

The Real-Touch Flower Collection of Arrangements and Table Centerpieces are now available online.

Custom orders welcome.

Happy Bidding!
